sentences: Ma teaksin seda paremini, kui saaksin rohkem infot.
Kui ta oleks olnud seal, ma teaksin kindlasti.
context: The Estonian word 'teaksin' is the first person singular conditional form of the verb 'teadma', which means 'to know'. It expresses a hypothetical or future possibility - what someone would know under certain conditions. This form combines the knowledge aspect with conditional mood, indicating that knowing depends on some circumstance being met.
